IPSLabResultsCodedValues

This Value set is defined as the union of: (a) ABO and Rh group [Type] in Blood (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.51); (b) Presence/Absence Indicators (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52) (c) Microorganisms (2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://art-decor.org/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.52--20170531000000
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://art-decor.org/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.49--20170531000000
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://art-decor.org/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.11.22.51--20170531000000
